reviews.title: Pikachu madness for your Nintendo 3ds xl
reviews.text: I purchased this product as a Christmas present for my Pokémon crazy grandson. He should love this case, since it features one of his favorite pokemons. He is also getting the Nintendo 3ds xl and a new Pokémon game. Trust me, he will be thrilled!

reviews.title: Comfortable communicator for  Xbox pals.
reviews.text: This lightweight Titanfall 2 Official Marauder Six Four Communicator for Xbox One works great. I hooked it up to my iPhone and my laptop and made volume adjustments on each until I got perfection. I highly recommend that you read the instruction booklet that comes with this Communicator, otherwise, you will most likely not get the volume adjustment and the off on to work very well. Also, when using your Xbox, make sure you adjust that volume accordingly on your tv for optimal results. When I used it to make a phone call, I could barely hear my hubby until I checked the volume level on my iPhone. Once I increased the audio level for that, then I could increase or decrease on the communicator. I could also turn off the ability for anyone on the other end to hear me. I liked that I could use my controller (only the new model) without any other attachments. It will not plug into the first gen Xbox one controllers.

reviews.title: Dance your heart away
reviews.text:
Ubisoft has figured out how to get you dancing and how to give you a trial to for additional music with Just Dance Unlimited. There is also a free app for Just Dance 2017, which allows your smartphone to be the controller. Or, for Xbox One, you can use the Kinect. Just Dance 2017 comes with 40 tracks: Anitta"Bang" Anitta "Bang", Ariana Grande"Into You", AronChupa Ft. Little Sis Nora"Little Swing", Beyoncé"Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)", Carlos Vives & Shakira"La Bicicleta", Cheb Salama"Leila", David Guetta Ft. Sia"Titanium", Daya Luz"Te Dominar", Deorro Ft. Elvis Crespo"Bailar", DJ Snake ft. Justin Bieber"Let Me Love You", DNCE"Cake by The Ocean", Dyro & Dannic"Radical", Equinox Stars"September", Era Istrefi"Bonbon", Fast Forward Highway"I Love Rock ‘N’ Roll", Fifth Harmony Ft. Kid Ink"Worth It",, Gigi Rowe"Run the Night", Halloween Thrills"Ghost In The Keys", Hatsune Miku"Po Pi Po", INNA ft. J Balvin"Cola Song", Jack & Jack"Groove", Jordan Fisher"All About Us", Justin Bieber"Sorry", Latino Sunset"Carnaval Boom", Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake"Lean On", Maluma"El Tiki", Maroon 5"Don't Wanna Know", OneRepublic"Wherever I Go", O-Zone"Dragostea Din Tei", PSY Ft. CL of 2NE1"DADDY", Queen"Don't Stop Me Now", Santa Clones"Last Christmas", Shakira Ft. Wyclef Jean"Hips Don't Lie", Sia Ft. Sean Paul"Cheap Thrills", Silentó"Watch Me (Whip / Nae Nae)", The Frankie Bostello Orchestra"Tico-Tico No Fubá", The Weeknd"Can't Feel My Face", Ultraclub 90"What Is Love", Wanko Ni Mero Mero"Oishii Oishii", will.i.am Ft. Britney Spears"Scream & Shout" and Zayn"Like I Would".

The app allows you to see other users' videos and has a photo booth where you can apply filters. You can share your own pictures from the photo booth and share on Facebook.

This makes for a totally immersive video and social experience,

reviews.title: Sing your heart out.
reviews.text: Christmas gift for the girl who decided she wanted to sing with a microphone. The songs will be all ones that she is familiar with so she can sing right along.

reviews.title: Pokemon Moon for Nintendo 3ds
reviews.text: Christmas gift for grandson who is pokemon crazy. He will love it.

reviews.title: Get ready for some swordfight, slicing and dicing
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:526540efc86f0b351cd8c3fe4de35af7]] The For Honor game eats up a whopping 32.30GB and that is before I add the Legacy Battle Pack. game. The graphics are gorgeous. Unfortunately, took forever to connect to the servers to actually play the game. After much time waiting for the game to get on my hard drive and then update, finally got through the servers to start playing the game. Got the game running and did the practice sparring with the dummies. This appears to be an exciting game with lots of slicing and dicing. The boy child should love it. Even after the beginning video ends, the graphics continue to be great. The only complaint I have is how long it took to connect to the servers. I would prefer for me to play by myself. The boy child likes to play with the universe. Not really an issue because the boy child will mainly play the game while I watch, fascinated by how well he plays and interacts with others.

reviews.title: a mechanical keyboard that you will love
reviews.text: I am in love with a keyboard. A mechanical keyboard with lots and lots of lights. I am like a kid with a new toy!  I love a gaming keyboard. I love the clackity clack and I love the colors....all of those programmable colors to make them unique to over 300 gaming profiles. Want a softer color, go to the Logitech support website and download the software so you can customize just about anything you could want out of this keyboard. While you are looking through the software that you just downloaded, you can also set up function keys, disable keys and more. You can program all function keys to simplify tasks and you have 26 key rollover where you can press any number of keys for complex moves. There is also a switch, which delivers 25% more responsiveness. Naturally, the kids will want to play with all of those pretty colors. Your mission, should you accept it, is to keep the grubby hands off YOUR keyboard!

reviews.title: Chat and hear everything going on around you
reviews.text: The boy likes to use the Turtle Beach Recon when he games so that he and the other players can strategize and whip some butt. He is a pretty good player and tells adults how to move forward in the game. He can easily hear me when I tell him it is too loud. For the price point, these are great headsets for Xbox and for PS4. The last pair I bough him was a year ago so he will be excited when he sees this new one.

reviews.title: great sound
reviews.text: I am loving the sound coming out of these earphones. The bass is great. The earphones come with two different types of ear tips. You get noise isolation the further you insert the earphones in your ears. The white buds offer more treble. The earphones have a hybrid driver that gives you Hi-Fidelity, low distortion and a very good bass. This is the first pair that I have used that has this capability of hybrid driver and I can say that it works very well. Love them.

reviews.title: PS3 Wireless Controller by Amazon?
reviews.text: This controller, once you insert batteries, syncs up perfectly with my PS3. I don't like corded controllers, because of how limited you are in motion. This wireless controller easily fixes that issue. The button setup is a little different from my original ps3 and aftermarket ps3 controllers. It looks more like xbox 1 controller, which gives me the sense of having the same playing  moves that you use with xbox, Because I didn't play a game and only made sure it worked and checked the menu of my ps3, I do not know if this has the dual shock ability. If it doesn't, we will use the other dual shock controllers when playing a game that benefits from that feature.

reviews.title: Cinderella Cinderella (bet the tune is running in your head now)
reviews.text: This was a used movie and we only had one spot that may or may not be corrected by cleaning. The movie is good and well done. I am liking the live action Disney movies. They are quite beautiful.

reviews.title: Lictin sent me another stand and it is working great
reviews.text: No matter how hard I tried, I could not get the stand to hold either of the xbox one controllers. I have several from xbox one and two from xbox one s. None would fit in the charging slot. I sent it back. Lictin contacted me and sent me a replacement. This one works great. Customer service is exceptional. I am very pleased that I can use the stand.

reviews.title: Xbox One S is the bomb
reviews.text:
Love the Xbox One S. I easily swapped all my games from the Xbox One with a portable drive and making the new Xbox One S the main unit. If you have more than one Xbox One, you have to make one the Home by following these directions: Designate an Xbox One console as your home Xbox
Note You can designate only one console as your home Xbox.
Press the Xbox button to open the guide.
Select Settings.
Select All Settings.
Select Personalization.
Select My home Xbox.
Review the information, and then do one of the following:
Select Make this my home Xbox to designate the console as your home Xbox.
Select This is not my home Xbox to remove the designation.

This will save you a lot of trouble if you know this up front. Otherwise, you think the new unit doesn't work correctly. I keep all my games on a portable drive so I can easily play in the living room or the bedroom.

I will be keeping the Kinect on my living room unit for the voice commands.

I haven't had any issues with this new unit and I have taken steps to keep it cooled while running. I would recommend this Console and the bundle.

reviews.title: Nice Xbox One controller
reviews.text: This controller came as part of an Xbox One S bundle, so I got a total of two controllers. I like the feel of this controller and when not in use, it sits atop the charging base to keep it ready for action.

reviews.title: Sleek storage for Nintendo Switch games
reviews.text: This case for the Nintendo Switch system is a nice little case. It is small enough to stash in a pocket or backpack and it holds 24 game cards and one spot that can hold a game or a memory card. This is a vast improvement over the DSi card holders. The case is slick, opaque and set up in such a way that you only have to flip from one page to the next. The front has a two snap closure, making it easier to keep secure when closed.

reviews.title: Easy charging for controllers
reviews.text: works just like I would expect. Easy to attach to controller and charges easily.

reviews.title: Keep your Nintendo Switch grips looking new
reviews.text: These colorful neon grips will work perfectly on the Nintendo Switch. These are colorful and bright and they are also comfortable. If you have a Nintendo Switch, you will want accessories like this. The also includes thumb covers. They do wear out with use. As do the originals. Which is why you need the covers - to save the integrity of the original. I find these kits very helpful to keep the original equipment looking new.

reviews.title: I have control of my controller!
reviews.text: You are going to love this controller. It is a dark navy blue with silvery grey pattern on the front. Attractive. I thought at first it was a speaker, but it is for looks. The headphone and chat combo can be hooked up with a standard 3.5mm stereo jack. This is a nice controller that gives you some comfort in your hands with the diamond rubberized back. The player buttons are nice looking too. And it is wireless. It connects to your pc, tablet or Xbox via Bluetooth connectivity and doing the hook up is a walk in the park. The controller also has custom mapping. It is stylized with a military look - hence the Patrol Tech design. I like the wireless for the convenience - I can sit on the couch or the bed to play one of the Xbox One units (yes, I have two). I like having an assortment of controller because some fit better in my hand, some are wired and some are wireless and I have a charging center for the batteries. I know some people who are going to have controller envy.

reviews.title: No One Touch My Personal Fav Controller
reviews.text: OMG! The volcano shadow controller is gorgeous. It is a nice red fade to black color. It is wireless so that you can connect via Bluetooth to your tablet, your pc or your Xbox One system. It is easy to connect to any of the devices. It also has a 3.5mm jack for you headset/chat headphone. The buttons are customizable and the back of the grip has a diamond pattern to give you an easier grip. I have to give props just for the Volcano shadow special edition controller. It is top notch and I am going to claim this baby as my own personal controller. The others can use the old Xbox One controllers and I might even let them use my other two favorite controllers, but not this one. This one is aesthetically pleasing to me and it is all mine.

reviews.title: I don't like how these fit
reviews.text: I wanted to love this headset. First thing I did, was take them out of the package and connect them to my pc so they could charge. With the charging cord, I easily connected and downloaded the updates, as suggested. Then I put them on. I didn't find they comfortable at all. In fact, I don't like the fit at all. The fit is just all wrong around my ears. I do wear glasses, but that did not factor into the fit. It is the earphone itself. The cushioned ear pad does not fit closely enough to cancel outside noises and it is irritating feeling the gaps. Got to say a no go for these. Oh, by the way, if you want to hear through these on your pc, you have to get a special adapter. When I plugged them in to charge, it showed up in my devices but when I turned them on I couldn't hear anything out of them except air. I have other headphones for my pc and will use them for the pc.

reviews.title: The girl is going to be happy. She loves Just Dance
reviews.text: The girl is going to be happy. She loves Just Dance and Minecraft. She has received  JustDance for the past several years and when nana comes to visit, they dance. This year, she is going to be happier. You get over 300 more tracks with a 3 month unlimited access subscription that comes with specially marked packages. They may all have the access, but since I don't know for sure I am not going to say that. On the disk for 2018, you get Shakira ft. Maluma Chante Je, Beyoncé Naught Girl, Luis Fonsi & Daddy Yankee Despacito, Bruno Mars 24k Magic, Katy Perry, Ariana Grande, Queen, Lady Gaga and more. Much more.

reviews.title: Boy love for Pokemon
reviews.text: The boy loves Pokémon games for his Nintendo 3DS. He doesn't have this one - until Christmas and I am pretty sure he will be playing the heck out of the game.

reviews.title: Someone exchanged the Destiny bag for a cheap laptop bag
reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson for Christmas because he wanted the bag. I checked ebay first and found that they were pretty hefty in the price. So I bought the entire set instead. What a disappointment. Someone had replaced the special bag with a cheap laptop bag. If I had known this, I would never have purchased it but the Warehouse Deals mentioned nothing of this. I would have loved having the extra Destiny pieces that came in this set but that has to go back with the rest of the box.

reviews.title: Everyone with an XBOX One and later need this charging kit for continuous charge and play
reviews.text: If you play Xbox One, you know your batteries run out and have to be replaced with either alkallines or rechargeable batteries. This comes with a nice braided cord for charging your controller AND a rechargeable battery pack. You can charge and have unlimited play at the same time. The charging cord is USB-A to USB micro. The connection to the controller comes with an LED light which is red when it is charging and green when it is fully charged.

reviews.title: I am loving this game
reviews.text: The review is in. I have to give this 5 stars. I love the improvements made to the game. I love the new animals and I love the plot. A Heaven's Gate type cult is waiting for the collapse that one man has said is coming. He has gone around and gotten as many people as he can to start a new life in Hope County, Montana. The freedom loving people want the cult to leave. The cult wants everyone else to leave. So you have a battle for survival. The graphics are fantastic, the story line changes dependent on what you do. Wait till you see the skunk. Get skunk or be skunked. So many great features. Team up with the Hope County Freedom lovers and fight against the cult. Danger lurks everywhere.

reviews.title: ... are a gamer and you want to play your best, you need to have a controller that won't ...
reviews.text: If you are a gamer and you want to play your best, you need to have a controller that won't slip out of your hands. This is a special edition controller for Xbox One and it is a military green (dark olive green). The custom diamond grips on either side help prevent you having the controller slip (you know how when your hands get sweaty). The black, silver and orange accents look nice. Oh, it is also wireless. It connects to your console or pc via Bluetooth. The buttons can be customized easily. Any compatible headset with a 3.5mm stereo jack will work with this controller. About the only thing that gets better is the Elite controller. With a special edition controller, you can be the envy of other gamers.

reviews.title: what do you do when you are traveling and don't have a power outlet?
reviews.text: If you have a Nintendo Switch, you already know that the full charge can quickly drain the battery, depending on the game being played. Some games will use 2.5 hours before the battery needs charging, others might last the full 6 hours. So, if you are on the go and your battery dies, this handy dandy charging battery pack will work wonders. You can play while you charge. If you want to charge it faster and to the fullest capacity, it will need the switch off and about 4 hours of non stop charging. This charging battery pack has a kickstand so you can continue your play while charging. There are also lights to display when you need to charge and the power level. You can charge via a usb connector to an outlet, a computer or a vehicle usb slot. Depending on the game you are playing, it can give you up to another 10 hours of play.

reviews.title: wired, multi color changing controller
reviews.text: Who doesn't want a see-thru controller that you can change the color to your own personal preference? This one has a rainbow of colors and you can select one or have them rotate. Tip, when you are playing, one color is best. This also comes with a head set. The power cord, which is attached, is ten feet long. You can use this on your Windows 10 pc or on your Xbox One. It also has a dual rumble. When the girl comes over, I have no doubt she will be grabbing this controller to play the games,

reviews.title: Quality NES Classic Controllers
reviews.text: Now the NES Classic is making the rounds again, wired controllers are definitely in need. Just like with all video controllers, some work better than others and some just simply give out. These are great replacements and have long cords (ten feet) so that you can sit back and play your games. The buttons are very responsive and the D button is precise. These make for some good replacement controllers or as add-ons for additional players.

reviews.title: Holds my console just great and the hub works
reviews.text: This is my second (really third) vertical stand with a USB hub that I have owned. The first one didn't work at all (no this brand) and had to be replaced. Still have issues with that one so I am happy to replace it with this one. Having the USB 3.0 hub is important to me. I have all kinds of devices that need a USB hub and I like that I can charge my phone while I play. I also like how the bottom lets air under the unit to help keep it cool. As for my controllers, the other one never quite charged them correctly and I will bring a charger into the office so that we can use the wireless or wired controllers in that room or the living room

reviews.title: Need new Xbox one thumb grips for your controller?
reviews.text: You never know when you might need new thumb grips for you Xbox One controller. AmazonBasics has you covered at a decent price point. The thumb grips keep your sweaty thumbs from slipping too. Now, these did not include directions on how to install them, however; you just need to snap them in place. Maybe you just want a different bright color on your controller. You can have it. These come in orange, black and green so you can jazz up your controller as you want. Note, these will make your grip higher and if you don't care for that, you can easily remove them.

reviews.title: PS4 controller grips could use some instructions in the packaging
reviews.text: In order to replace the ps4 grips, you actually have to press these to the existing grips. It would be  great improvement if Amazon included instructions for these, as there are none in the box and I thought it required taking the controller apart to replace the existing ones. I was wrong. I had to go back and look at the picture to see that they are push on over existing grips.

reviews.title: It does work and pretty good for a phone/game/laptop headphone
reviews.text: I tried this out on my gaming laptop tonight. It took me a few times before I could get it to work. Reading directions would have saved me a few seconds. It took me plugging it in, selecting headphones and I got nothing. So I unplugged, plugged it back in and it just started working great. So, tonight I am using it on my tablet so that I can listen to podcasts all night long in comfort.

reviews.title: The product company name is already different
reviews.text: The headset does a good job keeping noise to a minimum outside of your hearing bubble. The box that I got is from Onikuma, not Swenter. The earpiece does light up and to do so, plug in the usb and turn on the switch on the cable. The sound isn't bad and can get pretty loud. These are a great set for kids, especially since they go through them like they do charging cables

reviews.title: Perfect gaming headset for kids
reviews.text: This headset is at the right price point for kids. It works with most platforms. Depending on your Xbox, you may have to get an additional adapter for it to work. Works on my pc, ipad, iPhone, etc. The sound quality is good for a kid and most adults. An adult who is really into their sound will want to upgrade to the best they can afford. You will appreciate the comfort from the headphones. The mic works well. The best part of these, is noise reduction.

reviews.title: never got a chance to use and returned
reviews.text: had to return. it wouldn't fit over my glasses.

reviews.title: Nice headset with pretty darn good sound
reviews.text: We are an xbox one family and these are not compatible with xbox. But, they are compatible with my pc and laptop, which are both gaming computers. I like how these can be adjusted easily to your head and how well the noise cancelling works. The sound is better than what I would expect and the light up led on the sides of your ears just looks cool.

reviews.title: Decent gaming headset
reviews.text: This gaming headset can by used with xbox one S, PS4, PC and others. They are over the ear and have a colorful red on the outer earpieces. The noise cancelling is a definite must. These are very comfortable and with the extra bands on the band that goes on your head, it makes adjusting the fit much easier. For some items, you may have to buy an adapter to use it on older Xbox One controllers, apple products, etc. But not to worry, Amazon has them all.

reviews.title: Works fine as a wired controller
reviews.text: You are not going to get the full range of motion as you do with some controllers, but for a wired controller that kids will mostly be using, it works great. It is easier for some to use this controller instead of the Switch. It makes it much easier for multi players also.

reviews.title: Decent gamer headset
reviews.text: This headset is universal, so works with most gaming systems, including Switch, PS4 and others. The mic and the ear pieces are noise cancelling, which makes for a better gaming experience. Some systems may require a part and if you look on the Amazon page, there is a diagram to show you if you need an adapter. Sound is decent and the fit is great for kids.

reviews.title: It is always important to protect a screen
reviews.text: I don't own a device that can be dropped, stepped on, or cracked in any way, that doesn't have a screen protector. This is a 2 pack. If you have kids that play Nintendo Switch, this is a must. Otherwise, it will cost a lot of money to repair the Nintendo. reviews.title: cool new gadget for Xbox One
reviews.text: Well, I wished I had read the outside of the box closer. I read the front where it states "Requires content download". So, I bought the game from Microsoft for $19.99 and then when I was getting everything out of the box, I found that there was a game code inside. Now I have to wait for Microsoft to refund me before I can play the game. That can take 72 hours. But, I have been reading about this laser gun and people are stoked. The games do not get the same amount of praise, but, as new ones come out, I am sure they will get better. Especially if this gets really popular with gamers. If you go to mars.pdp.com, you will find all the games that can be used with the system. Most of the issues have been with the games, not the Lightcon or the IR station. Another issue that has been cited, is the placement of the IR station. Follow the directions to get it in the right position. A neat thing, is that this can be played on any type of tv or projector that you can use an Xbox on. The gun gives you better control in your shooting ability. It does use batteries in the gun and the IR station is attached to the Xbox. Personally, I go on cruises alot and I can't wait for my refund so I can install using the code that came with the game. I also purchased Qubit's Quest but I can't download that one until I get the first game refunded. You can have up to four players. Extra Lightcons can be purchased on Amazon.

reviews.title: Koopa Troopa in Real Life
reviews.text: Koopa Troopa is one of my favorite Nintendo characters and he really seems full of life in all of his glory with this Amiibo character. Koopa Troopa has all details that make him unique, including his shell, feet, signature smile, and look. Amiibo is just like having a real Koopa Troopa to admire and adore in real life. Plus, the Amiibo features are really cool because you can insert him into all of your favorite Nintendo games!

reviews.title: Perfectly Detailed Plush
reviews.text: Super Cute!!!!! This adorable large plush amiibo is perfect for any Nintendo lover. The plush really makes it seem like you have a real life Yoshi in your house! The details are extraordinary, especially with his wooly feet, shell, and dino details on his head. I love this amiibo and it is really well made. I think this is a great addition to the amiibo collection.

reviews.title: Endless Variety of Things to Do, Places to Go, and People to Meet
reviews.text: I really loved playing this game. My husband bought it for me as a gift and I played it obsessively. You can dress almost every character in the game in any variety of clothing possible, including accessories. You can reach a goal of a great, big fashion show, if you become fashion-savvy. There are endless varieties of things to do, people to meet, and places to go. Hours of fun to be had and a great game for anyone who loves shows like Project Runway.

reviews.title: Attention to Detail Brings Character to Life!
reviews.text: Bowser Jr. is one of my favorite Nintendo characters and he really seems full of life in all of his glory with amiibo! Bowser Jr. has all details that make him unique, including a little fang on the left side of his mouth, his signature eyebrows, bib, wristbands, and his beloved clown car. The amiibo has amazing attention to detail and is really well made. It works really well with the amiibo system. I highly recommend it for any Nintendo fan.

reviews.title: Not so comfortable, but fun to have
reviews.text: This is a fun retro controller to have around the house, but it is not very comfortable to use in practical terms. The Wii controllers are the most comfortable controllers by far. Although the Wii U Game Pad is a bit bulky and heavy, it is still more comfortable to use, than this boxy little controller for long periods of play.

reviews.title: A must have for any Kirby fan
reviews.text: Super cute amiibo action figure has all of the great features that make King Dedede amazingly unique- his hammer, giant flippers, hat, and fancy clothes. The amiibo is very detail-oriented and helps bring this character to life.

reviews.title: A must have for any Kirby fan!
reviews.text: Meta Knight amiibo is amazing. He is very detail-oriented and has all of the charm of a Kirby character come to life. The amiibo features help bring him to life in other games, which is a really great feature.

I absolutely LOVED playing Ori and The Blind Forest- it was pretty much like playing a cinematic movie come to life. However, Nintendo still rules in our house. We have a Wii, Wii-U, Switch, and every other console ever made by them. The games for Nintendo consoles are just much less violent and cute. Xbox games are more violent and not for families.

reviews.title: Great Game, Especially for Multiplayer Style
reviews.text: For Borderlands 2, the very fact that a friends can pop in and pop out to join your game for however long they please, all the while the leveling system intelligently takes care of differences makes this totally worth it for those with casual gamer friends.

reviews.title: Digital "Download" of Code is Great
reviews.text: The "online game code" facet of this Xbox Live subscription is fantastic, as you can start using Xbox Live immediately. I personally prefer purchasing here over directly through Xbox Live since it is very difficult to cancel a subscription to Xbox Live when you have your credit card tied to your account. Perhaps things have changed lately or will soon, but last time I was not using my Xbox Live account for several months, it was a complete pain to cancel the auto-renewal with my credit card that was in place, and I ended up having to call in to deal with it. With this, after 12 months, my subscription ends, and that is it - since, after all, Xbox Live does not have your credit card information if you buy here. Totally worth it.

reviews.title: Extremely pleased w/ the seller I got it from...
reviews.text: Okay so I've been keeping an eye on the pink Microsoft 360 controller for a few years now. I've been an avid gamer since I was about 11 (til present-23), and when I saw this controller existed I flipped and just knew I had to have it. However, the times I almost bought it, it was at a ridiculous price of $160 or so. I waited it out in hopes of getting it for half that price if I was lucky. Finally about a month or so ago I got it from a great seller for about $60. I immediately bought it. I was really worried, as the seller was just launched, but after emailing them and getting polite and prompt responses about my inquiries, I took a chance. I'm glad I did because when I opened the box, a brand new boxed up pink 360 mint condition wireless controller was in it. I absolutely love it and can't believe how fast it came. I got an incredible deal and I'm so glad I waited to get it. This controller is sick and I also love how the Xbox home button on the controller glows white instead of green! Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Full of rages & very challenging!
reviews.text:
I wouldn't call myself a hardcore gamer (due to lots of work and energetic ferrets), but I am quite experienced and it's my passion and life. I played the original DK Country and good god it really requires patience and fast puzzle solving skills. This version is just as tough. Just when you come across a level and think after finishing it, "god, what kind of douchery was that..." The very next level will be ten times harder (not all the time, but very often).

This game will make you rage. I don't care if you're the most experienced gamer in the world- there's never gonna be any gamer that says they beat every level without dying at least once. I died maybe 40 times on one level alone. I almost broke my Wii but I chilled and eventually beat it. It is super challenging and I highly recommend this game to anyone who is tired of playing intense RPG or FPS games. Trust me you'll be in for a treat. Just don't kill your stuff while playing.

5/5 for a challenge which games these days lack, cute sound FX, nice graphics, easy game controls, and fun puzzles.

Long live DK!

reviews.title: Almost perfect...
reviews.text:
I bought this at a Frys and decided to leave a full, honest review on here. I got this because of the review for this product I read that gave it 5 stars, but ended up returning it after trying it on in the parking lot. So here are some pros and cons if you are reading this and trying to make a decision.

PROS:
- Feels great in your hands
- Solid grip, not slippery
- All cutouts are almost completely accurate
- Has big controller-like bumps in the back for better grip
- Kickstand is still usable unlike with most cases
- Easily removable- hassle free

CONS:
- Two buttons (right arrow and Y) rub slightly against case (makes it feel a little off)- other than that, all cutouts are flawless
- The front top and bottom pieces of the case are not anywhere near snug like the rest of the case, they are actually somewhat flappy and loose- nothing major, hence why only one star was deducted, but for $30, it really should be a little better

I’d say this case is worth $10, maybe $15 if these problems were addressed. I would definitely buy again if they were. But those small things were enough to bother me (I’m a perfectionist with stuff though so I’m very articulate/picky). However, this would definitely be a 5-star product for the people who would shrug these issues off. Overall, I do recommend but I definitely wouldn’t buy again for $30.

reviews.title: Seriously, get this one...
reviews.text:
My fiance and I just got a Switch and we wanted the screen protected, so we went with some “officially licensed” garbage from Best Buy for $8. As soon as I put it on, there were bubbles all over and two ridiculous smudges that seemed to have appeared out of nowhere (and I know I didn’t cause them). I immediately afterwards put an order in for this product. It only took two days because of Prime and arrived in perfect condition.

I put up pics of both the Best Buy one which brought only one protector, a wipe, a crappy cheap cloth, and a thing for bubbles (barely worked) and the Cellularize one which brought two protectors, two wipes, two nicer cloths, two things for bubbles (which I only had a couple very tiny ones so not a big deal), and two sticky sheets in case anything got stuck to the adhesive side of the protector.

The quality between the two products is immediately noticable, especially when you feel the protectors. I feel like the Best Buy one was plastic. No joke it could bend like crazy. If you do that with tempered glass (what an actual screen protector SHOULD be) then it will shatter after force is applied. Anyways, this one feels SO nice and heavy duty. It was easy to apply and is VERY clear with perfect cutouts for the little areas that need them.

I highly recommend this to anyone thinking about switching screen protectors or buying a new one. I mean $6 for two quality pieces. You just can’t beat this. My ONLY minor complaint is that they advertise it as “bubble-free” but that’s not accurate. However, if you know what you’re doing, it takes seconds to get rid of them. If you have trouble using the bubble-removing thing, just gently and slowly lift the corner nearest the bubble and reapply which will make it disappear.

reviews.title: Great game, great price
reviews.text:
$30 is all I paid and it was worth evry penny.

Portal is a fun 1st person puzzle game. It's the reason I bought Orange Box. Team Fortress 2 is such an improvment on the 1st one! It's incredible fun. I'm not much in to Half Life 2 single player, but Ep 1 and Ep 2 do add more content to the wonderful Half Life 2 game. I already had Hald Life 2, so I was able to give the extra copy to a friend so they can enjoy the game as well! I really liked that, as I didn't want to waste money on a game I already had.

I don't see any reason not to buy Orange Box. You even get Peggle Extreme which is a HL themed (demo) version of Peggle. I liked it so much that I bought Peggle Deluxe from STEAM.

reviews.text:
It's less a game and more of an interactive movie, you can't really lose but you can change how the story goes. The graphics are great, the gameplay is fun and the sound is very good.

When I got the game, I popped it in to the PS3 and after an update was at the main menu. I went through the options and stuff, and found out there could be two players. My daughter quickly grabbed a controller and decided to play as the "spirit".

I played as the main character, doing things like walking around and beating people up. She played as the ghost or "spirit" Aiden(?) and could move stuff and do other supernatural things. Basically you switch between the two characters to get things done, CIA spy stuff or teen "Carrie" stuff, or even saving homeless people stuff. She got really mad when I wouldn't do what she wanted me to do, but I told her I play like I want and she plays like she wants.

As Aiden she can be mean and vengeful or helpful and peaceful. Once we finish the game we will have to switch parts, I want to try being a ghost and totally poltergeist that party of rowdy teens!

If there was more gameplay and less interactive movie, I would have given 5 stars. It's major funage, and even better with a friend (or relative). It's mostly like Heavy Rain; press a direction or hit a button fast. Sometimes I didn't know which direction to press in a fight, it was confusing a little, but I couldn't "die" so it was all good (after some practice I got better, but the fight sequences could have been a little more clear).

So if you are looking for a good story (told out of sequence, yeah for nonlinear) and like interactive movies, this is the game for you. And it's cheap.

And buy "Heavy Rain" too! It's also wicked fun, more so with the PS3 Move.

reviews.title: My 14YO daughter loves this game!
reviews.text: She would play it constantly if she could, but I need to game as well! I will have her come on here to give a more in-depth review. For now just know its a fun rhythm game with songs by vocaloids.

reviews.title: It feels nice in my hands and I can hold the 3ds ...
reviews.text:
It fits very loose on my New 3ds XL. You also can't swap out carts without removing it. It feels nice in my hands and I can hold the 3ds better with it. I'd say it's a toss up between having a better grip on your 3ds or not having the flexibility of switching games easily. It should have been designed better, but because I usually only play one game at a time and swap it out once I finish it, I may just continue to use it.

Also, it doesn't seem to mark up my 3ds when I take it off. I have a nice looking one and if it scratched it at all I would have rated it much lower.

edit: After more use it seems that it likes to make it's way off the 3ds when I carry it around in my bag. This worries me as I don't want my 3ds scratched up. Of course, when I try and take it off myself it doesn't ever want to and I have to work for it. Perhaps there is some simple way to do it and I am missing it.

I am never able to hit the power button with this on my 3ds, I have to use the stylus and that just means it will get worn out faster.

Because of these things I am taking off one star.

reviews.title: It works as should
reviews.text: It's a charger, and it works. I only give it 4 stars because Nintendo should have included it with their New 3ds XL systems and having to buy it separate kinda sucks. And don't argue that I shouldn't give this a lower rating because of the 3ds not including it because I don't care; this is the official Nintendo charger and Nintendo should have spent the extra $2 (cause you know this only costs that much to make) and included it with the system.

reviews.title: Do not buy this game until it is patched again. Still broken as of 7/11/15
reviews.text:
I love this game on PC, it is great! You team up with people and pull off heists, so very fun. I had it on the 360 but it never got all the DLC or updates that the PC did, so when I saw it was coming out for the Xbone with all the maps included I had to get it. That was a mistake.

There are some issues with the voice chat, but that can be worked around by being in an XBL party and chatting there. When you try and pick your heist online, in game it's called Crime.net, the game locks up for few moments every 10-15 seconds seconds, but that is more of an annoyance then anything. The real issue is trying to join games online: you can't. When you go to Crime.net and see a game that someone is in that you want to join, you select it then on the next screen you can join it. If you try and join, it locks up for a few seconds then boots you back to the main Crime.net screen with an error message stating you can't join the game.

You can't play with people online.

You can start a game and invite people, and be invited by others, but if you have no friends with the game or none are online when you are, you will not be able to play with others.

There is a single player game of course, but you only get 2 AI players and they can do nothing except shoot and be shot. So good luck hauling bags of jewels to the escape van, it's all on you.

If the game worked it would probably get 5 stars from me. The state it is in now, it gets 1.

Oh, and as of this review it's been out in the US for about a week and there is still no patch. It was also released in the UK even earlier and there is still no patch. The previous console versions were never updated and never got the DLC that they promised players, which makes me wonder if they are going to do the same for current gen consoles now. Take the money and run? I hope not; my fingers are crossed that the game gets fixed.

I will update my review if things change.

*** UPDATE***

The game was patched! Finally! Yes! It no longer freezes when you try and join games online. Well, it doesn't freeze every few seconds on the Crime.net screen anymore. It still freezes when you select a job and try to join a game, and it still won't let you join any games.

I added a star for effort to my rating.

reviews.title: The grip is good but it no longer charges.
reviews.text:
The Vita is so small, this grip makes it much easier to play and hold, and it has an extra battery built in that helps me play many more hours between charges..

It worked great for a few months. My Vita lasted so much longer, I rarely had to charge it. Then one day I plugged it in and heard a *click* and now it won't charge and the plug is all loose and wiggles.

The grip still works great, but I can't charge it so it goes from 5 starts to 2 stars.

I have yet to contact Nyko to see about a replacement but I will update this review when I do.

EDIT: I emailed Nyko and they said to send it to them so they can check if it is broken and replace it if necessary. I don't like the idea of having to pay to ship it to them, but if it is replaced I guess it's a small price to pay. I will update as things progress.

The guitar works flawlessly, even better than the red one I bought a few weeks ago. I like how it can fold to be carried around, and it seems a better quality than the other guitar I bought; I don't feel like it will fold up while I play if I push on it hard enough.

If you need a new guitar, this one is it. If you want the game too, then this is a good bundle. Get it on sale for a great deal!

reviews.title: When you need a break from Zelda
reviews.text:
Great game!

I never played Cave Story before. I know it was a browser game at first, and has been released on numerous platforms, but I needed more games on my Switch and had been wanting to try this one out for a while.

It's a 2d side scroller. You get health and weapon upgrades as you shoot your way around a few different parts of an underground world. There are multiple endings and after I won the game I actually went right into a second game to see a different ending.

Included are some trial levels too, like use X gun and Y ability and get to the end of the stage. They unlock as you do things in game, I only unlocked one and I didn't enjoy it much.

There are some downloads coming later this year I think, multiplayer or something, and more trials.

If you like other versions of the game, or have never played before, this is the game to get.

reviews.title: Phenomenal RHYTHYM game...
reviews.text: Lackluster for a kingdom hearts title but amazing if you’re seeking out a rhythm game for the switch. The game is incredibly light on story so if you’re seeking that and only that prepare for disappointment as it gives you a rundown of the first 3 titles and includes 25 minutes of new footage. The characters are fantastic, You level up and gain items which you can use in the harder levels. (Proud difficulty) The game is challenging on Proud mode but not overbearing. With enough practice anyone with enough patience will get it. Don’t listen to the naysayers. It’s a great rhythym title, A not so great kingdom hearts one per se as kingdom hearts has set the bar high to earn that title (minus a few misfires..KH3 DLC Im looking at you) all in all you won’t regret it!  Easy 8/10 for this one.

reviews.title: Who wants to HEAR a millionaire?
reviews.text:
*UPDATE ON REVIEW*
**They released an update with voices! So now it can be heard with subpar voice acting! Lol. It’s not a bad game at all though and I’m glad they included the voice pack! The original review is below**
Fun game! However, You can tell the budget is obviously limited. No voice acting whatsoever, Everything is a ackwardly read with the music in the backround, They could’ve gotten a random joe to read a script but since they want to add more questions in the future I suppose it’s better for their budget. Straightforward so far, You can pick the category of questions. Super simple up until the $32,000 question. There’s an easy mode with no timers set but.. Unless you’re 10, I don’t see much of a point. Not bad for $30, But don’t rush to get this. It’s exactly what you’d expect. Over 3,000 questions though! Graphics are much better than I thought they would be. All in all 6.5/10

reviews.title: Go joe!
reviews.text: Much much better than I thought it would be. An unknown game company with a limited budget and a big 80’s property could spell disaster, BUT they did well. Solid voice acting. Fun (But definetly difficult) levels. I wish there was a bit more variety other than shoot here and walk here and shoot some more. Get an item, Shoot your way out, Find health packs. Shoot some more. End. All in all reviewing from a price point perspective $39.99 and an unknown company. This could’ve been much much worse. 7.5/10

reviews.title: Donkey Kong country fan? Then this is a no brainer..
reviews.text: Collecting four letters that even resemble the yellow letter in DKC, Secrets in areas that resemble DKC, Barrels and mine carts were replaced with look alikes, It’s honestly FANTASTIC. Warning though just like the game it pays tribute to it gets fairly difficult fairly quickly as the game is about 4-5 hours long but there’s a casual mode for those who don’t want as much challenge with extra checkpoints and so forth. If you’re a fan of platformers (especially old school ones) This game is not to be missed. It may resemble DKC but it has its own charm and characters and world to explore, 5 stars 🌟

reviews.title: And the winner by knockout…is..
reviews.text: Rocky! Knocked out creed 4 times. If you ever wanted Adonis and Apollo creed to go at it, Rocky and Adonis, If you want to hear famous lines like if he dies, He dies. If you want over the top, non simulated boxing that isn’t quite a button masher and actually requires a bit of strategy and isn’t exactly easy even on easy mode, If you like ready 2 rumble, Super punch out, Non serious arcade simulation boxing game then this game is a no brainer. The story mode is based on speech bubbles and short comic strip like stories. The graphics are nice for the arcade feel it’s going for, Every single character has a story line, Some you’ll know from the movie, Others you’ll meet for the very first time and fall under the funniest of stereotypes. But in all honesty this game does what it sets out to do well, Arcade boxing. It’ll hurt your fingers after a few fights from the button pressing and the frustration but it’s a fun fight. The sounds are funny to hear minus Rocky. When you pick Rocky in the story mode every single time his dialogue bubble pops on the screen he does a weird grunt in the most Stallone way possible it’s hilarious. All in all it does what it sets out to do, It’s not done incorrectly, It’s not budget made as most of us are used to. It’s a good quality, Arcade feel, Fantastical boxing game that gets a 4 out of 5 stars. Get it if you miss arcade boxing games, Get it at a lower price if you have no idea what arcade boxers even are 💥🌟

reviews.title: Classical gaming Bliss
reviews.text: So I’m sure if you’re on this page you know what to expect from Wonder boy, Or if you’re in the younger generation and have seen collectors play these games on YouTube or have played the remakes that have come out the past few years, Regardless wonder boy is known in the gaming community for its Platforming/RPG elements and revolutionizing a genre that wasn’t thought of until this title. Let’s start with part 1, It’s an arcade port. Think of it as an endless runner with being able to kill the enemies and platforming that gets gradually more difficult, It’s the weakest in the series but has held up pretty well! Part 2, An arcade port once again but the dynamics that are featured heavily in later monster world titles come from here, This game is the foundation of the game as we know it today so probably the most important one in the series, Be forewarned it is a quarter muncher as it is an arcade title but with an endless rewind feature and save states, You won’t have much trouble getting through it. There are some parts that I’m left wondering how you’re not supposed to spend $10 in quarters to beat it back in the day. As for 3 and 4 there’s a huge shift in quality and gameplay, These are not arcade titles but ports of the Sega console titles, They’ve honestly aged really well! After playing part 2 know what to expect from part 3, But part 4 is my personal favorite! It’s the metroidvania of the series very reminiscent of the Shantae series. This one is legit fun and I highly suggest that you check out the remake that came out not long ago if you like the original! (or you can just get the remake, which includes the original, Decisions decisions). The extras are honestly bare bones, You get an image gallery that looks like it was thrown together in 2 and a half minutes to make it look like the game has more content, Deff one of my least favorite parts of the compilation as it makes it look a little cheap. All in all it’s a nice compilation and worth the $29.99 and if you find it on sale even better! The classics are all here and you can change the aspect to full screen with crisp graphics or it’s original resolution or even throw in a CRT filter to make it look truly old school. It’s a 7/10 for me. I go by the .5 rating system by the way so it’s not a high 7, just an fyi! Try it out if you enjoy classic gaming! Hope this helps

reviews.title: Pay up with inflation!
reviews.text: Didn’t expect this, I bought the 2 taito ps2 games that came out back in that era and they were FILLED with amazing games! It had obscure ones, Newer ones, Japanese only ones. It was so great to have so I expected a similar collection here and boy, Was I utterly disappointed. This is the most bare bones, barely replayable and Uber expensive collection I’ve EVER COME ACROSS. I love collections of old arcade games Such as the Capcom arcade collection, Sega collection, Wonder boy collections and so forth, I’m a sucker for them actually, But THIS? This is what we get for $40? Do yourself a favor and get the ps2/GameCube era collection..Or play the roms because this is an insignificant rip off that’s worth $10. Seriously, over charging here would be $25. $40 for games that are nothing more than a mediocre collection of non memorable 80s games? HARD PASS. I love collections, I am the target fan base for these but this, This is not it. If inflation had an overcharged game in the 2020s, This right here is it. Stay far away. This gets a whole 0.5/10. The half a score is because it exists and the games aren’t terrible but EXTREMELY overpriced.

reviews.title: Join us in the revolution.
reviews.text: Wow, This is a review in progress, I’m 15 hours in and I’m having a complete and total blast with this game. Know what to expect, This is a game made by a handful of people, It’s not your typical AAA assasins creed live game service, It’s more in the vein of the gothic series, If you’re not familiar with that the most closely I can compare it to is Mid 2000s BioWare games: (Knights of the old republic, Jade empire, dragon age) You’re in this huge open world and travel around trying to get people on your side to help with the incoming invasion. The story is A LOT better than I expected it to be, The graphics are ok, I won’t give that one too much credit on the grand scale of things but for such a small team? It’s impressive. The gameplay is fantastic, The game doesn’t hold your hand as much it’s a lot about you discovering locations, looting, Finding secrets, Branches of conversation that dictate the destruction around you (Good and evil plots) But honestly if you miss playing games with big open worlds, Looters, You enjoy the fallout series and have time for a game that’s about 30 hours long then do yourself a favor and check this one out! Thank me later! But remember, Don’t expect AAA. Small team, small budget, BIG ideas. Hope this helps!

reviews.title: Where’d the rest of my game go?
reviews.text:
I’m a HUGEEEE Mario fan. Super Mario bros on NES was the first game I ever played in my life, I was 3 yrs old in 1988 and it came bundled with my Nintendo, I get EVERYTHING MARIO, I mention this so you don’t think I’m just hating on this just to hate, Quite the opposite, It hurts that I’m writing this review m, But if I can help someone save $60 I will, In this economy I know ID appreciate it.
I’m not going to go too much into detail here so let me simplify it, It’s a fun game, Really fun in fact..IF there was ANYTHING to do! No story mode for some illogical reason so we get cups, ok fine I was willing to live with that, The cups are ALL THE SAME EXACT THING. Since there’s BARELY any characters to play the game with, All characters you choose you’ll be going up against, I’ve played against the exact same team that I’ve chosen multiple times! This looks like it was made in a few months, Aside from an amazing looking opening introduction FMV, This game falls completely short and is an utter disappointment not only to sport fans but Mario fans.
Nintendo has had the trend recently with their sport games to release unfinished titles, Mario golf star rush didn’t have a lot to do but honestly I feel bad that I EVER COMPLAINED with that game. It had a story mode, it had competitions and a competent multiplayer. The multiplayer aspect of the game is an utter letdown, You believe well they didn’t concentrate on single player so Multiplayer must be making up for it somehow, Absolutely not. You would think if everyone had their own switch they can play each character on your team (There’s 4 of them) But no, You can’t. Up to 2 only. And get this, YOU CANT CONTROL THE GOALIE. Ever! One of the biggest points of strategy in sports games is controlling every aspect, And the goalkeeper has to be a dumbed down CPU controlled player. In all honesty I can keep going over how utterly bare bones and disappointing this game is, But..Don’t waste your hard earned money. Times are tough right now, And this game can care less. Shame on the industry for releasing this at $60, But I think we’re the biggest suckers here. 3.5/10. AVOID.

reviews.title: Play like it’s 1997.
reviews.text:
This game in all honesty is a game made from simpler times in an arcade machine. On rails shooter (You can’t freely move for those that don’t understand the lingo) That you button mash and find weak points on the zombies, Fight a boss, Fight a super zombie, Fught a super boss. Wash, Rinse and repeat. Aside from the simplistic nature, It’s fun as all hell. I love playing through the campaign to get better scores and branch out to different paths. The remake graphics aren’t mindblowing in the least bit, But they are nice. I am hoping for the sequel they add a bit meatier content, I love that they were faithful to the original but these games don’t need a faithful recreation, But to have been inspired by it and expand on the basic lore from these stories into something a little bit more…2022 perhaps.
The music is your basic rock riffs, The sounds are nice and the features are actually pretty cool! Owning the physical edition is phenomenal, I love the Limidead cover art with the 3D card and the cardboard cutouts included inside, Great package, Wait for a sale if you’re unsure..it’s super short, About 45 minutes to be exact but it has a ton of replay value, So grab a friend or your partner and travel back to a simpler time. 7.5/10

reviews.title: Oh man…
reviews.text:
So I didn’t expect a massive rpg, Nor any action, TBH my expectations were pretty low for this game…And this is coming from someone who liked both visual novels and loves the original bloodlines game, HOWEVER…
This game is a huge buggy mess, peoples faces have just straight up dissapeared when I’ve spoken to them, Pop in texture is horrifying, I haven’t seen. It this bad in a game in years, And this is the series X version we’re speaking of here. The graphics look like the characters were dipped in grease and have the most dead looking faces I’ve ever seen, Nothing in this world feel alive.
The gameplay is just as bad, Aside from there being ABSOLUTELY NO ACTION, 0%, None, Nada, Could’ve been forgiven if the game has a strong plot since you know…That’s what would have to hold it down as it has pretty much nothing else to rely on, It is excruciatingly boring. It’s hard to get through the story, Hard to care for the characters, And in a game that gives the illusion of dialogue choices, You pick the answer you like and you guessed it, You get it wrong. So you have to power up some of your abilities to be able to answer these questions, But the game mentions a brief introduction on how to do this in text on a menu and you never see it again. Right when you begin you can’t talk much, So why are the options even available? Is it for a second play through? This is the kind of confusing mess you’d be walking into. This game is worth at MAX $15-$20 price range. I support devs, I support indie games, I give things a chance, But save your hard earned money, And your time. It’s bad, Maybe if you catch it on a super sale and if you’re still interested with the knowledge of what I wrote above then hey, Power to you and I hope you enjoy it, But in all honesty…This is the worst next gen game I’ve played, And one of the worst full priced releases I’ve ever touched. Well its $10 less or $20 less depending o the generation you own. Glitchy, Buggy, greasy, Dead eyed graphics, HORRIBLE sound that’s uneven in my surround sound and on the stereo in my television, Terrible tutorials (Pretty much none after an initial text on screen) Terrible story, Cringe worthy voice acting and no gameplay minus “investigating” which means walk up to something..Press A or X depending on the console, and follow a trail, enter a room, press A again. This game is a full on stinker. 1.5/10

reviews.title: Serious Sword Skills.
reviews.text: If you don’t know about Samurai Showdown series from the SNK arcade and home console days there 5 million ways to play them on every console/emulator known to man from 93 on. This game is fantastic, So good in fact I had it on ps4 and when I upgraded to the series X I got it again for the extra characters and the HUGE reduction in load times. The graphics take a bit to get used to, It’s a modern rendition on cel-shaded graphics from the ps2 era. The moves are fantastic in this game, However they did simplify the control scheme for players who are new to the series, I’m not one to complain as the more players there are the more chance there is for the series to keep moving along. Great sounds from the game, Incredible move set, Nice character selection, Detailed levels, Although in this day and age I do expect a deeper story mode and that’s where my negatives come in, With as much more and as much experience as this title has under its belt it’s about time they give it the Story mode treatment that’s not just a beginning text, A middle standard cutscene that’s the same for everyone, And an ending unique to each character which is blink and you’ll miss it. I do love the series, And I hope this is the reset button to make a fresh new start to make it much bigger and better on the next one, If you’re new to the series start here! And if you’re not and you’ve been waiting for a price reduction, Now is the time! All in all a strong 8.8/10. Based on price at the current time, Graphics and sound. Story is lacking and therefore it recieved a reduction in score as well as a few ticks off for other bugs encountered during gameplay.

reviews.title: XenoWow!
reviews.text:
I’m not a xenoblade fanboy, Got the original, Didn’t care for it…Got chronicles X on Wii U and didn’t care for it either, Skipped part 2 because I thought it was an overhyped game that was just barren/empty wastelands, But my friend convinced me with all the footage he saw and leaks and so forth, And I was like I’ll give them one more shot, 2 days later as I write this review I’m 16 hours in, And I’m confident enough to write a review, Give it a perfect score of 5 stars, And tell you that this game is a MUST OWN title for EVERY RPG fan. The graphics are nice, But that isn’t the main draw of the title, We all know the switch is dated hardware, But the gameplay is PHENOMENAL.
The story, To the point where I am at least has been absolutely engaging. It knows how to hook you in and develop in a way that you want to know what’s next. So many different areas to explore and secrets to uncover, Crafting, Cooking, Class switching, Gem creating, Character Merging, Honestly I can go on and on, I’ve never on Amazon left a perfect review for a game, But in all honesty I don’t have to play it all the way through to know that there’s no way this game will go downhill the further along you get, It starts in the midst of action. You don’t need to play previous Xenoblade titles as it’s its own beast. If you have played the previous titles it does have certain nods to it and story elements that tie it in, But think of it as final fantasy, It’s just a numbered entry in the universe of Xeno but it’s not a sequel. If you’re on the fence on getting it, I was as well…I understand all too well how you feel but do yourself a favor and pick this one up, It’s a strong contender for the best switch game I’ve played which was previously held by Breath of the wild…This game is a 10/10. Masterpiece. Thank me later and enjoy 😃

reviews.title: Capcom presents…
reviews.text:
HADOUKEN! Alright, Alright so if you’re on this page you know what this is! You’re either a retro gamer, A collector, Or someone whose experiencing these titles for the first time (I wish I was) it’s a VERY nice collection with tons and tons of Museum pieces to learn about the history of each game. The presentation is crystal clear and you can literally customize it to your complete liking! Then why not a perfect 5 stars? Well….
There’s no new ground here. Aside from the unreleased darkstalkers title, Most have played these games in various other collections, But what baffles me the most is that this came out 2 weeks apart from capcom Arcade collection 2, Which included most of the games listed on here already! I feel like it was a bit of a cash grab to do that to the fans. I love old school capcom (You can only like current time capcom if you enjoy resident evil or Monster hunter since that’s all they seem to put their efforts on to these days)
It’s an amazing little collection, Is it worth $40? A little hard to say. If you don’t love retro gaming or are new to the genre in general this would exactly be the best place to start. The games are unforgiving in difficulty, Although you can change the settings technically but my kids tried at the lowest difficulty and failed. I can rock it with the difficulty almost all the way up so it’s honestly just a matter of patience and learning curves, Which you will get! But if you want a quick fix, Try Capcom arcade 2 on the digital storefronts. If you want some Hadoukens, Yoga fires, Vampiric and (oddly enough) Cyber mecha fighting, Then look no further! Beautiful graphics that can be smoother out in options or even made to look like the days of the arcade!
Great selection of games (Although a bit lacking on it being different properties rather than SF, Darkstalkers, etc)
The sound is top notch and everutging can be customized to your liking! All in all this is a very well rated 8.5/10!

reviews.title: Wompa Wompa World
reviews.text:
Do you miss playing platformers of the N64/GameCube era? Are you a fan of Mario or crash bandicoot games? Do you wish more games were like Banjo Kazooie or Donkey Kong 64? Have you played the original and miss it? If you answered yes to any of the questions above then by all means, This warrants a purchase. A perfect price for the platformer genre to have nice sales numbers. Great graphics, And if by some reason you don’t own the original Pac-Man in 5 million other compilations that’s included here as well as new mazes that are modernized when the game is completed. Great sound, Great graphics, Fun old school gameplay, Easy to understand and jump on! You can have a blast by yourself or telling your family members where to jump or grab an item they missed!
The only thing I have to knock off for points is that I wish it was a bit longer, The sound is good but there’s not much to it, Those are honestly just nitpicks if I had to give a negative but honestly, This deserves your time. This is not another Run of the mill remaster that’s been coming out lately it’s one developed with love and attention to detail! 4/5

reviews.title: Streets of rage 2…The sequel
reviews.text: If you enjoy streets of rage 2 Specifically (This has similar music, similar power ups, health pickups, weapons and boss structure) Then THIS is the game you’ve been waiting for. Beautiful 16 but era graphics with an AMAZING soundtrack. Remember that these beat ‘em ups were quick plays so it’s over after 6 stages, BUT there are challenges to beat and tons of unlockables! Well designed character models, Controls are fluid, Graphics made me feel like I’m playing a brand new Genesis game without the Genesis sounds (Thank baby Jesus) all in all, This is a sleeper hit of a game you don’t want to miss. For what it is: A retro, Streets of rage 2 inspired, Side scrolling beat ‘em up with beautiful graphics and music along with sounds, Nice stage layout, great variety, I must say this is the rare 10/10. (This perfect score is based on the game it is, for example I wouldn’t put it on the same level as xenoblade 3 by any means, But for a retro inspired beat em up, It’s perfection)

reviews.title: Worth the wait
reviews.text: Worth the wait , bought from Amazon for retail. Amazon has such a better process for buying a ps5 compared to the PS store . If you ask for an invitation to buy a ps5 from amazon and get an invitation in your email , you for sure 100% can order one . It’s not a free for all like the other method for buying it from the manufacturer for retail . I love that Amazon made the process easy and straightforward. It’s a great system , our ps4 couldn’t handle some games and would sound like it was getting ready to take off flying . The ps5 is so smooth and quiet . Doesn’t overheat . It’s been fun for sure . Worth the wait . Paying Retail is awesome. I like buying directly from amazon as the seller. It did get dropped off with my bottled water boxes and just left . If you order one be aware it will just be left on your doorstep like it’s a $12 case of water . Not signing for it surprised me a lot .

reviews.title: flexible but not too flexible
reviews.text: I ordered this for our quest , it came in a vinyl ziplock with a barcode sticker on it . It’s a soft flexible material that bends easily but not too  much . The inside has extra cushioning that feels waterproof or at least possibly sweat proof . The little black thing is an inside lens cover to block out any light when not In use . I like the way this feels a lot . Definitely improved comfort

reviews.title: Nice upgrade !
reviews.text: I love this ! It feels better on my face than the one I was using . I’m happy I ordered this , I hope it lasts . I will Update on the durability after Iv used it a few months . I love the options I have now . It arrived in a clear clamshell stapled shut . It would be a great gift to anybody who doesn’t like the fit of the one that comes with the quest when you buy it .

reviews.title: Great upgrade once you figure out installation
reviews.text: Overall a good upgrade from the OEM it’s a 5 star product with 4 star installation. It helped the quest fit better for sure . Reduced the slippage of the headset making game play smoother . Made my son a happy camper , his head is pretty big for 11 but not quite adult sized so this helped with the fit , and to keep it from getting soggy with sweat . A good upgrade . I did have to assist in the installation process but after a bit of research it was clear on what needed to be done . I’d order it again if I had to do over.

reviews.title: Must have upgrade for beat saber
reviews.text: It’s a better fit in  the face gasket , so much better fit . None of the other replacement gaskets have felt this good . Add the fan and it’s a whole new level of playing in comfort . I think this is a clever idea . Dual function easy to install upgrade. I think I’m  n luv

reviews.title: The joy in my sons face said it all
reviews.text: I have these to him today and he immediately played beat saber . I could hear him thru my wall having a blast . After few hours he come back and I asked him what he would rate them and he said 5 stars . He said he had a good time scoring early with the baton separated and using them to have a longer reach . I told him I’d read that gorilla tag was supposed to be more fun with them and his eyes got big and he took off to go play his little heart out . It’s a cheap upgrade for the joy he gets from these . Kid approved .

reviews.title: Nice long cable
reviews.text: Really nice setup , excellent design. I’m very happy . I did think the white part and cord came with tho and was kinda disappointed but the cable included makes up for it mostly . They should not include the item in the photos if it’s not included . I had plans for the white charging block amd cable I didn’t get . But I’m still happy so I can’t really complain

reviews.title: Works great for the quest and PS5
reviews.text: I had ordered this for our quest 2 and used it for that until the usb c cable for the ps5 was chewed on amd the end chewed off . It plugs into the usb port on the back of ps5 and works to charge the Ps5 controller and is super long . It’s a nice length for the quest and makes it so much easier to move around. Overall I think it’s a good choice for a quest cable upgrade or ps5 extra long controller charging cable . I used it to charge a bunch of other usb C devices as well . Go pro compatible too. Sooooo many uses . I honestly think you can’t go wrong with this . It’s nice to have such a long cord . It’s a good gift too . I’d recommend getting it is you have a need for a a good uSB C cord .

reviews.title: Affordable fix for a common issue
reviews.text: It’s an almost complete replacement kit , I’m a noob to this and had expected the replacement cases I saw in the listing but it’s everything but that . I know now that it’s just the insides and not the white case part for the bottom . I am new to this VR parts world and wanted to have everything needed for repairs because it is such a common issue I knew it was a matter of when not if it needed repair . I wish they would only feature the parts included in the photo of the item listing. I have been watching the tutorials in preparation of the day my son tells me he’s having controller issues. I think I’m ready.

reviews.title: My little gamer loved them
reviews.text: They work good , look cute . I knew about the usb power plug for the lights before I ordered them and have had a similar pair before so it wasn’t a problem. It’s exactly what I needed for my kid to use . Nice color and decent sound . It’s worth the price . I think as long as you understand what you’re buying you won’t be disappointed.  The lights work plugged into a power bank too if you don’t want to plug into the usb port on your game console or an independent usb block

reviews.title: 3 speeds !
reviews.text: I got this for my husband and overall it was an easy set up . The fan has 3 settings . Low , high and off . It’s an upgrade for the stability of the ps5 for sure . It makes it more stable in the standing position. I like knowing what battery status is based on the controller charging lights . For $20 it’s a good deal. Easy gift choice for any ps5 fan.

reviews.title: These are really nice
reviews.text: I had ordered the $20 set fir my son and he was trilled . These came up in my feed and after a little research I found out that the pro and quest 2 have the same handles so I ordered these for my son and he’s so happy . The other ones were exactly what $20 ones would be expected to be and these are double the cost but 3x better quality. It’s funny how when you have no upgrades that a simple upgrade seems amazing and then you get upgraded from that and it’s just mind blowing . It’s like they say , you get what you pay for . These are so well done!! Works on quest 2 perfectly

reviews.title: Side changing works well
reviews.text: This thing is so cool , it’s made to impress . My son set it up and I went to check it out and it’s neat looking . The batteries plug into the stand to charge . The side charging works in his with the upgraded strap . The lights are pretty cool. It works great , exactly as described.

reviews.title: It synced up with iPhone so easy
reviews.text: This is such a cute controller !! It synced up perfectly with my iPhone . It was the sync button on the left top that you need to press to sync it . It won’t sync with out pushing the right button . The paw button covers are a little bit different pink than the controller body but that’s not a big deal . I like the usb C plug and use our USB c ps5 controller charging cord to charge it . The light on the controller is fun too

reviews.title: This stand blows
reviews.text: It is really a great design and blows cold air thru the ps5 so it won’t overheat . It helps secure the ps5 too so it’s not easily knocked over . It has been a really nice upgrade to our system. I do like the controller charging feature a lot so they done get lost as easily while not being used . Everybody that sees it asks me where I got it . I feel cool lol .

reviews.title: This came with the charger plug in part !!
reviews.text: So Iv ordered a few of these and been disappointed by the photo in the listing showing a charging block that plugs into the outlet but it isn’t actually included in the set . This had it included !! I was so happy it was included and not just in the photo of the listing . I can’t even begin to describe how happy I am about this one little piece being included . It is such an important piece and needed to get the most out of the charging setup . It is really a complete set up . It’s great . Well made and really helping to keep the battery from dying . My son has a quest 2 and this worked flawlessly with it .

reviews.title: Amazing Plug and play adapter
reviews.text: It’s an impressive piece of equipment. It does exactly what it advertises and more . Switch ,Steam Deck , Mac , IPhone compatible !! My father in law has an older TV that isn’t a smart TV and he doesn’t have any game if systems to bridge the gap either . My kids know grandpa has an “old Tv “ lol but he does have an HDMI port so it’s not that old . My kids have no idea what an “old “ Tv really is . I had actually orders this to make my father in laws TV fun while we visit and it really made his old TV do everything our newer tv can . It’s very user friendly plug and play . I swear I needed this thing like 10 years ago . It’s a very well designed piece of electronics. Overall I’m impressed as are my kids and husband . My father in law thinks I’m brilliant! I didn’t tell him it’s not me , that it’s this little plug and play adapter . I think it’s worth the retail asking price and upgrades even the most basic tV . It’s idiot proof IMO . It has so many uses besides the basic charger function . Mom tested , kid approved . Buy it you’ll like it !! Good gift for any owner of the above mentioned devices .

reviews.title: My vr playing tween approves
reviews.text: Extends playing time , well balanced . Kid tested mother approved . My little dude is all about his VR setup . I got him the PS4 vr setup when he was just a little dude and since then he’s gone thru quite a few headsets and graduated to the occulus quest 2 and is a bit of a beast when it comes to gaming. If it’s not made well or right he wont use it or it won’t last long being used . He has an adult sized head for sure , he needs adult sized equipment for a proper fit . The battery pack strap is made well and easily adjusted . Charging cable for everything else vr related is compatible with this . It’s a good upgrade for sure . Nobody wants to quit playing because the battery died , or be stuck plugged in no matter how long the cable is . This solves a lot of issues that limit game play. One of the best extra battery options Iv ordered .

Con's
